personal-background.en: Originally came from Guangdong China, I migrated over to the UK when I was in grade 2, where I grew up and received my education. Having graduated from university recently, I decided to come back to China to work here for a few years, in hopes of getting a taste of the culture here as well as the lifestyle in the big cities. But ultimately, I will have to make a tough decision between staying, or pursuing my career overseas for the long term.
personal-background.cn: 原本来自中国广东，我小学二年级时移民到英国，在那里长大并接受教育。刚大学毕业不久，我决定回中国就业几年，希望能体验一下这边的文化和大城市的生活。但最终，我还是得做出一个艰难的决定，留在这里，还是长期去海外发展。

achievement-description.en: Awarded for being chronically online and made it to a page on the local newspaper.
achievement-description.cn: 因成为一个网瘾少年而获奖，并上了当地报纸的一个版面。
